Syncope will have the following releases (see images below to know more about details and timeline):
  1. *Crescendo* May 10th 2011 [http://code.google.com/p/syncope/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3AMilestone-Release-20110510 issue list]
  1. *Sostenuto* July 2011 [http://code.google.com/p/syncope/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3AMilestone-Release-201107 issue list]
  1. *Ritornello* December 2011 [http://code.google.com/p/syncope/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3AMilestone-Release-201112 issue list]
  1. *Soave* Q1 2012 [http://code.google.com/p/syncope/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3AMilestone-Release-2012Q1 issue list]
  1. *Diesis* Q2 2012 [http://code.google.com/p/syncope/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3AMilestone-Release-2012Q2 issue list]
